summary: The "SEND THEM BACK Act of 2025" (H.R. 190) proposes the expedited removal of any non-citizen who entered the United States illegally on or after January 20, 2021. This mandate would apply even to individuals who have indicated an intention to apply for asylum or expressed a fear of persecution. The bill includes an exception for any alien who was a member of the U.S. Armed Forces as of January 1, 2025. Introduced by Representative Ogles and several colleagues, the bill was referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
